eng: Wednesday is for power workout while Thursday is his rest day.
luo: Tich Adek otiegorega ne teko mare kae to oyweyo Tich Ang'wen.

eng: He returns to the gym on Friday for some strength and conditioning training while Saturday is for mobility and flexibility workouts.
luo: Odok e gym Tich Abich mondo orie lechene kae to Ngeso otiegore tiendene gi bedene.

eng: Aromo won his first silver at the 2018 Africa Championship in Mauritius.
luo: Oromo ne ohango loyo mich mar okombe mar fedha e piem mag 2018 Africa Championship mane otim Mauritius.

eng: He failed to qualify for the Rio Olympics in Brazil in 2016.
luo: Ne ok oyiere ne tuke Olimpiks mane otim Rio, Brazil e higa mar 2016.

eng: "I was dedicated to learning the sport more.
luo: Owacho kama, "Naketo chunya e medo puonjora tugoni.

eng: "It was sheer hard work and consistency in training for seven years that helped me to win the medal in Mauritius," he said.
luo: Kinda ma ne atimo kod tiyo matek kuom higni abiriyo ema nokonya locho Mauritius."

eng: The medal inspired the father of two who now has great confidence in the discipline.
luo: Mich ma ne oloyono ne ojiwe mondo odhi nyime gi tugono kendo sani en gi nyithindo ariyo.

eng: Aromo strongly believes he will be a continental champion some day.
luo: Aromo oyie ni chieng' moro en ema obiro locho e Afrika e piem mar ting'o chuma.

eng: The 32-year old focused lifter finished fifth overall at the Africa Games in Morocco in 2019.
luo: Aromo ma jahigni 32, nobedo namba abich e piem mag Africa Games mane otim Morocco e higa mar 2019.

eng: In the next five years, Aromo dreams to be a continental champion.
luo: E higni abich mabiro, Aromo nigi geno ni obiro namba achiel e Afrika.

eng: Since he started to captain the national team in 2019 in Morocco, Aromo has learnt key lessons in life among them leadership skills.
luo: Chakre Aromo bed kapten ne tim mar Kenya e piem ma ne otim Morocco, osepuonjore gik mang'eny ahinya moriwo bedo jatelo maber.

eng: "I feel great and honoured to be the skipper of Kenya team. I'm constantly reminded to be a responsible citizen."
luo: Owacho kama, "Awinjo kamor ahinya kendo en thuolo majaber ahinya bedo kapten mar tim mar Kenya. Tijni kinde duto parona ni onego abed raia minyalo gen."

eng: "I did not play the game as an amateur, i joined the sport as a senior at 21years when I bumped on some weightlifters in the gym at Kitengela." Kenya Team Captain Maurice Aromo.
luo: "Ne ok adonjo e piem ka ng'at ma onge lony moro amora. Nachako piem kaka ng'at maduong' ka arwako higni 21 e kinde mane aromo gi joting' chumbe e gym mantie Kitengela." Maurice Aromo, Kapten mar Tim Jo-Kenya.

eng: Weightlifting: Kenyans Langat and Oduor strike silver as Achieng bags bronze
luo: Ting'o Chuma: Langat kod Oduor ma gin Jo-Kenya obedo namba ariyo Achieng' obedo namba adek e piem

eng: Triple Africa silver medallist Winny Langat (women 59kg) and new entrant Janet Oduor (45kg) bagged silver medals at the Africa Weightlifting Championships cum Olympic qualifiers in Nairobi last evening.
luo: Winny Langat (mine ma ting'o kilo 59) ma osebedo namba ariyo nyadidek kaachiel kod Janet Oduor (kilo 45) ne obedo namba ariyo e piem mag Africa Weightlifting Championships ma itimo Nairobi kiyierogo joma biro dhi e Olimpik.

eng: Teenager Rachael Achieng won bronze in women’s 64kg. Lang’at scored 61 in Snatch and 81 in Clean and Jerk for 142 points.
luo: Rawera manyako, Raphael Achieng' ne obedo namba adek e ting'o kilo 64. Lang'at ne oyudo alama 61 e yudho chuma piny kitero malo kod alama 81 e golo chuma piny kiketo e goki kae to itero malo ma duto koriwo to obedo gi alama 142.

eng: Odour scored 42 points in Snatch and 50 in Clean and Jerk for 92 points. Achieng, who is also the Youth and Junior Africa bronze medalist, had 60 and 70 in the categories for 130.
luo: Oduor ne oyudo alama 42 e yudho chuma piny kitero malo kod alama 50 e golo chuma piny kiketo e goki kae to itero malo, ma duto koriw to alama 92. Achieng' ma ne obedo namba adek e kidieny mar rowere ne oyudo alama 60 kod 70 ma koriw en 130.

eng: Kenya’s Anthony Libasia scored 117 points in Snatch and 137 in Clean and Jerk to finish fourth with 254 points in men 73kg.
luo: Anthony Libasia ma be Ja-Kenya, noyudo alama 117 e yudho chuma piny kitero malo kod alama 137 e golo chuma piny kiketo e goki kae to itero malo, ma koriw to en alama 254 e piem mar kilo 73. Kendo nobedo namba ang'wen.

eng: The category was won by Ben Hnia of Tunisia who amassed 330 points.
luo: Ng'ama ne oyombo e kidienyno en Ben Hnia ma wuok Tunisia ma noyudo alama 330.

eng: At the same time, Africa Zone Two champion Wilkister Nadzuwah Nyiro will be in action this afternoon in the women 76kg.
luo: Kawuono godiechieng, Wilkister Nadzuwah Nyiro biro piem ting'o kilo 76. Oselocho nyadiriyo e Afrika.

eng: She longs to improve her Clean and Jerk personal best that currently stands at 82kg.
luo: Ogombo ahinya kalo rekod mare mar ting'o miket e gok kilo 82.

eng: Her personal best in Snatch is 70kg. “I am ready for the competition, it’s now or never. I want another gold,” she said. Nyiro has been training at Alpha Fit Gym in Nairobi and in Kitengela since returning from the 2019 African Games in Morocco where she finished seventh overall.
luo: Rekod mare e yudho chuma en kilo 70. Owacho kama, "Aseikora ne piem, onge kinde maber maloyo sani. Adwaro loyo okombe machielo mar dhahabu." Nyiro osebedo ka tiegore e Alpha Fit Gym man Nairobi kod Kitengela chakre noduog koa e 2019 African Games mane otim Morocco kama ne obedoe namba abiriyo.

eng: She believes she stands a great chance in the ongoing qualifier owing to the fact that she has been conducting her exercises under supervision of five weightlifting coaches and three others for strength and body conditioning.
luo: Oparo ni onyalo locho kaluwore ni osebedo kotiego gi ji abich molony e ting'o chuma kod ji adek mamoko molony e rieyo del.

eng: “I feel my technique is good. I am now waiting to replicate the same on the podium on Saturday.”
luo: Owacho kama, "Aparo ni yo ma atiyogo en yo makende ahinya. Daher timo kamano e pap chieng' Ngeso."

eng: Nyiro was introduced to the sport by coach David Adeyomo who guided Kenyan Olympian James Omondi Adede to qualify for the 2016 Rio Olympics.
luo: David Adeyomo ema ne okelo Nyiro e piemgo kendo en ema notiego James Omondi Adede modhi e tuke Olimpik mane otim Rio, 2016.

eng: “Apart from embracing the sport, I have also taken the initiative to mentor young players from Thika,” Nyiro said.
luo: Nyiro wacho kama, "Kata obedo ni an be apiem, akawoga thuolo mondo atieg rowere moko mawuok Thika."

eng: Meanwhile Olympic coronavirus guidelines are being drawn up for each separate sports competition, a Tokyo 2020 senior official said yesterday.
luo: Jal moro ma tiyo gi joma nochano tuke Tokyo 2020, nowacho ni iloso chike mag corona mabiro tayo tuke duto mibiro tim e Olimpik, kendo moro ka moro biro bedo gi chikege.

eng: Organisers have released Covid-19 prevention measures.
luo: Joma chano tukego osechiwo weche manyalo konyo e geng'o Covid-19.

eng: Triple Africa silver medallist Winny Langat (women 59kg) and new entrant Janet Oduor (45kg) bagged silver medals
luo: Winny Langat (mine ma ting'o kilo 59) ma osebedo namba ariyo nyadidek kaachiel kod Janet Oduor (kilo 45) ne obedo namba ariyo

eng: No pressure for AFC Leopards coach Patrick Aussems ahead of Mathare United fixture
luo: Koch mar AFC Leopards, Patrick Aussems ok oluoro tugo mochomogi gi Mathare United

eng: AFC Leopards coach Patrick Aussems has urged his charges to remain focused as he aims to help the club end its 22-year Premier League title drought.
luo: Koch mar AFC Leopards, Patrick Aussems dhi nyime timo kar monyalo mondo okony tim mare yudo okombe ma osetamgi yudo kuom higni 22.

eng: According to the Belgian, he will not let anything block his vision, not even a temporary place at the top of the league standings for a day or two.
luo: Kochno mawuok e piny Belgium ne owacho ni ok bi weyo mondo gimoro amora, kata mana loch ma gin-go sani ogeng' lek ma en godono mar loyo okombe.

eng: Ingwe have a realistic chance of moving joint-top of the FKF Premier League table with KCB (36 points) today if they beat struggling Mathare United at Ruaraka Grounds.
luo: Ingwe nowacho ni gin gi thuolo ma bedo namba achiel e list mar FKF Premier League kanyachiel gi KCB (ma nigi alama 36) ka giloyo tim mar Mathare United e tugo ma dhi timore e paw Ruaraka.

eng: But Aussems has strongly cautioned against premature celebrations that might come with their temporary ascendency to the summit.
luo: Aussems nosieme jotugo meke ni kik gibed mamor ahinya gi loch ma gin-go sani ma ketogi namba achiel kuom kinde.

eng: A victory with a big margin (4 goals plus) at Ruaraka will see Ingwe lead the table for the first time in many months.
luo: Ka tim mar Ingwe olocho mabor (gi gonde 4 kod mamoko) Ruaraka to ginyalo siko ka gin namba achiel kuom dweche mogwaro

eng: However, the former Simba SC coach wants Ingwe players and fans to stick their eyes on the big prize which is to win the elusive title at the end of the season.
luo: Kata kamano, koch machon mar Simba SC dwaro ni jotugo mag Ingwe ochom wang'gi kuom mich maduong' mondo omi gibi gilo okombe e giko tuke ma higani.

eng: “If we win on Thursday, then we will be at the top, but (being at the) top is not important right now,” Aussems said after his side was held to a barren draw by Posta Rangers last weekend.
luo: Bang' wuok mar marom e tugo gi Posta Rangers juma mokalo, Aussems nowacho kama, "Ka walocho e tugo ma dhi timore Tich Ang'wen, wabiro bedo namba achiel. Kata kamano, bedo namba achiel ok e gima duong' sani."

eng: And even as Aussems lamented poor officiating and the state of the pitch for their stalemate against the mailmen, he knows this is equally an important game for Mathare United, who are coming off a 2-2 draw with Nzoia Sugar.
luo: Aussems noywagore ni noyaw tugo e yo ok ber to be pap mane gigoche gi Posta Rangers ne olos maber, kata kamano, ong'eyo ni Jo-Mathare United bende okawo mapek tugo ma gidhi bedogo bang wuok marom gi tim mar Nzoia Sugar (2-2).

eng: But he believes their one game in hand gives them a chance to continue piling pressure on the leading pack as the race for the CAF Champions League qualification hots up.
luo: Kata kamano, en gi yie ni tuko achiel ma gidong'go biro miyogi thuolo mar yudo alama momedore mamiyo gidong' namba achiel sama piem mag CAF Champions League dhi ka tedore.

eng: Leopards are currently third on the log with 33 points, two behind second-placed Tusker.
luo: Tim mar Leopards ema sani en namba adek gi alama 33 to giluwo bang' Tusker ma nigi alama 35.

eng: On the other hand, Mathare, who recently acquired the services of former Harambee Stars assistant coach Frank Ouna, are rooted at the bottom of the table with a paltry eight points.
luo: To komachielo, tim mar Mathare, ma nyocha oyudo jokony koch machon mar Harambee Stars, Frank Ouna, oywa goro gi alama aboro kende.

eng: “Pressure is for the bears and wolves, so that’s not a problem. We still have one game remaining and if we win, we will be at the top. I know at the end of June there will be something special but after that, the league will finish in August,” said Aussems.
luo: Aussems nowacho niya, "Dubu gi ondiegi ema weche oridorenegi, omiyo wan wachno ok chandwa. Pod wadong' gi tugo achiel, to ka walocho wadhi dong' namba achiel. Ang'eyo ni nitie gima kende ma dhi timore giko dwe mar Jun, kata kamano lig biro rumo e dwe mar Agost."

eng: “You need to know that we played 10 against 15 today (Saturday). Eleven players from Posta, the pitch and the three referees. I don’t like talking about the referees, but everything was against us. We need to have a good recovery because on Thursday we will be back in action, but I hope not on this pitch again.”
luo: Omedo niya, "Onego ung'e ni wan gi jotugo 10 to joma ne wagochogo kawuono (Ngeso) ne nigi 15. Jotugo apar gachiel mar Posta, pap kaachiel gi refari adek. Ok ahero wuoyo e wi refari, kata kamano, gik moko duto ne omorowa. Dwaher locho kendo nikech Tich Ang'wen wabiro gocho kendo, to ageno ni ok e pawni."

eng: Just like AFC, Gor Mahia will be seeking to narrow the gap on the league leaders KCB when they battle with Vihiga United in Mumias.
luo: Mana kaka AFC, tim mar Gor Mahia be dwaro ni gilo Vihiga United ka gin Mumias mondo giyud alama e lig machiegni gi KCB.

eng: A win for the record champions will see them take their points tally to 28. and leapfrog Bandari into the fifth spot.
luo: Ka gilocho to mano biro miyo gibed gi alama 28 mabiro golo Bandari e namba abich.

eng: Coming from a community predominantly known for its athletics prowess, Fifa assistant referee Gilbert Cheruiyot wants to conquer greater heights in football.
luo: Kata obedo ni owuok e oganda mong'ere ne ng'wech, Gilbert Cheruiyot ma en refari makonyo e Fifa wacho ni odwaro goyo okang' e tuk opira.

eng: Cheruiyot, who is a Fifa accredited referee, has worked his way up to become one of the most respected match officials in the continent.
luo: Cheruiyot osetiyo matek ahinya mondo obed achiel kuom refari momi luor Afrika.

eng: Born and raised in Lembus Kiptoim, in Baringo County, Cheruiyot had a dream of playing professional football during his childhood but lack of support seemed to have dimmed his desire.
luo: Ne onyuole Lembus Kiptoim, e kaonti mar Baringo, kendo ne en gi lek mar tugo opira ka ne pod otin, kata kamano, nikech ne onge joma nosire gomboneno ne olal.

eng: He chose football instead of athletics, going against the norm in his community, something that did not go down well with his parents who insisted he should focus on his education or try athletics.
luo: Ne oyier tugo opira kar ng'wech, mopogore gi kaka jo ogandagi jatimoga, to mano ne omoro jonyuolne ma ne dwaro ni oket pache e somo kata e ng'wech.

eng: “Coming from a community that likes athletics more than any other sport was one of the main challenges. My community considers playing football a waste of time. And I could receive a beating from my parents whenever they saw me play with my peers,” said Cheruiyot.
luo: Cheruiyot wacho kama, "Pek maduong' ma ne aromogo ne wuok e oganda mohero ng'wech moloyo tugo moro amora machielo. Ogandawa neno tugo opira kaka ketho sa. Jonyuolna ne chwadaga ka ne atugo opira gi mbesena."

eng: But despite being reprimanded by his parent, Cheruiyot never gave up on football.
luo: To kata obedo ni jonyuolne ne oyie kode, Cheruiyot ne odhi nyime tugo opira.

eng: After his secondary school education, in 2006, he decided to go for a refereeing course.
luo: Bang' tieko skul mar sekondar e higa mar 2006, ne odhi tiegore bedo refari.

eng: Since making up his mind of being a referee in 2008, Cheruiyot has never looked backed, rising from officiating local village football tournaments, Division Leagues, FKF Nationwide league to being a common face in the Football Kenya Federation Premier League matches.
luo: Chakre ong'ad ni odwaro bedo refari e higa mar 2008, Cheruiyot pok oywago ang'e modok chien. Nochako gi tuke mitimo e gweng', modhi e Division Leagues, FKF Nationwide League to tinde ojanenore ding'eny e tuke mag FKF Premier League.

eng: “Since 2008, I have developed from the lowest ranks through to the Kenyan Premier league and Confederation of African Football (Caf) matches,” said Cheruiyot.
luo: Cheruiyot nowacho kama, "Chakre 2008, asetimo dongruok kachako gi tuke matindo madhi e tuke mag KPL kod mag CAF."

eng: Seven years later, the 37-year-old official bust into continental limelight as he oversaw several matches in different parts of Africa and there’s no slowing down for the lanky official.
luo: Higni abiriyo bang'e, refarino ma jahigni 37 humbe nochako landore ka ne ochako dhi e tuke mopogore opogore e pinje mag Afrika.

eng: And as Kenyans eagerly await the Tokyo Olympics showdown scheduled to be held from July 23 to August 8 this year in Tokyo, Japan, to witness their athlete’s battle for medals, their eyes will also be trained on the football fields as Cheruiyot makes those vital calls along the touchline.
luo: Sama Jo-Kenya rito mondo Olympics ochakre Tokyo tarik 23 Julai nyaka tarik 8 Agost higani, mondo gine kaka jong'wech piem e yudo mich, girito bende neno kaka Cheruiyot biro bedo refari sa mitugo opira.

eng: According to Cheruiyot, one of the challenges referees face mostly is language barrier.
luo: Cheruiyot wacho ni achiel kuom pek madongo ma giyudo kaka refari en romo gi jotugo ma wacho dhok mopogore kodgi.

eng: Cheruiyot and Mary Njoroge are part of the 99 officials selected by Fifa from 51 countries to officiate at the Olympic Games.
luo: Cheruiyot kod Mary Njoroge gin moko kuom ji 99 moyier gi Fifa e pinje 51 mondo oyaw tuke mag Olimpik.

eng: They will be in charge during the men and women’s football matches at the world games.
luo: Gin ema gibiro tayo tuke opira mag mon kod chwo e tuke moriwo pinje.

eng: Fifa appointed 25 centre referees, 50 assistant referees, 20 VAR officials and four support referees.
luo: Fifa noyiero refari 25, jokony mag refari 50, afisa mag VAR 20 kod refari ma kojolo ang'wen.

eng: Cheruiyot, who officiated at the Caf Confederation Cup between Orlando Pirates of South Africa and Raja Casablanca of Morrocco in south Africa on Sunday, said he feels honoured to be among the match officials selected for the Summer Games.
luo: Cheruiyot ma ne omoko tuke mag Caf Confederation Cup e kind Orlando Pirates mar piny South Africa kod Raja Casablanca e piny Morrocco chieng' Jumapil ne owacho ni omor ahinya ni oyiere ne tuke madhi timorego.

eng: “I don’t take this for granted; it is a big honour for me and the country. Out of the many referees, I am among the selected few,” he said.
luo: Nowacho kama, "Ma ok en gima akawo mayot, en gima kende kuom kod ne pinywa. An achiel kuom refari manok moyier e kind refari mang'eny mantie."

eng: Cheruiyot, who was named the most improved assistant referee by Kenya Premier League in 2018, credits his refereeing journey to hard work and resilience.
luo: Cheruiyot ma ne owach gi Kenya Premier League ni e jakony refari ma osetimo dongruok malach e higa mar 2018, wacho ni gima osekonye bedo refari maber en tiyo matek kod sinani.

eng: “The climax in refereeing is being at the World Cup; it is every referee’s dream to officiate at that top level. Olympics is second after World Cup,” he said.
luo: Nowacho kama, "Tij refari ma nigi nyadhi mogik en sa World Cup. Refari diuto nigi lek mar chopo e World Cup. Olimpik en namba ariyo bang' World Cup."

eng: Cheruiyot began his continental journey in 2015 when he officiated at the Caf Under-17 tournament in Niger before heading to Rwanda the following year for the 2016 Africa Nations Championships (CHAN).
luo: Cheruiyot ne ochako tije moriwo pinje e higa mar 2015 kane oyawo tugo mr Caf Under-17 e piny Niger kae bang'e odhi Rwanda higa mane oluwo ne tugo mar 2016 Africa Nations Championships (CHAN).

eng: In 2017, he was among the match officials who officiated the CAF Under-20 tournament in Zambia.
luo: E higa mar 2017, en achiel kuom joma ne otayo tugo mar CAF Under-20 e piny Zambia.

eng: Cheruiyot said one of the challenges referees face mostly is language barrier.
luo: Cheruiyot nowacho ni achiel kuom pek madongo ma giyudo kaka refari en romo gi jotugo ma wacho dhok mopogore kodgi.

eng: “When officiating especially international matches you normally meet with players and officials speaking different languages, you speaking English, players speaking Arabic others speak French, but we normally say refereeing is a universal language, when you blow the whistle or raise the flag the players should just follow instructions”, he said.
luo: Owacho kama, "Sama in e tuke moriwo pinje iromo gi jotugo kod jomatayo mawacho dhok mopogore, iwacho Kisungu to jotugo wacho Dho-Arab, moko wacho French. Kata kamano, wawachoga ni rifari wacho dhok moriwo ji te nikech sama ikudho frimbi kata ting'o bendera malo, jotugo biro ng'eyo gima iwacho."

eng: Gor Mahia players protest after losing the CAF Confederations Cup match against Napsa Stars of Zambia in Lusaka on February 21, 2021.
luo: Jotugo mar tim mar Gor Mahia ong'anyo bang' ka tim mar Napsa Stars mar Zambia loyogi e tuke mag CAF Confederations Cup ma ne otug Lusaka tarik 21 Februar, 2021.

eng: Gor Mahia duo Kenneth Muguna and Boniface Oluoch have been slapped with Sh3.2 million fine by the Confederation of African Football (CAF).
luo: Sama Jo-Kenya rito mondo Olimpik ochakre Tokyo tarik 23 Julai nyaka tarik 8 Agost higani, mondo gine kaka jong'wech piem e yudo mich, girito bende neno kaka Cheruiyot biro bedo refari sa mitugo opira.

eng: The two stars were on Monday found guilty of violent conduct on a match official during a CAF Confederation Cup match on February 21, 2021, against Zambian side NAPSA Stars.
luo: Ne oyudi Wuok Tich ni jotugo ariyogo ne okelo chochni ma giketho gik moko e tugo mar CAF Confederation Cup tarik 21 Februar, 2021 ka ne gitugo gi NAPSA Stars mar Zambia.

eng: Gor Mahia players roughed up South African referee Lebalang Mokete who awarded Zambian side NAPSA Stars a penalty in the dying minutes of the game
luo: Jotugo mag Gor Mahia ne ogoyo refari ma Ja-South Africa Lebalang Mokete nikech ne omiyo jo NAPSA Stars penalty sama ne tugo dhi ka rumo.

eng: NAPSA scored and knocked out K'Ogalo on a 3-2 aggregate scoreline.
luo: NAPSA ne oloyo K'Ogalo gi gonde adek to Gor ne oyudo ariyo.

eng: After the final whistle, a section of Gor Mahia players confronted the referee, leading to a short but ugly scene.
luo: Ka ne tugo orumo, jotugo moko mag Gor Mahia ne omonjo refari ma gigoye.

eng: In a ruling by the CAF Disciplinary Committee, Oluoch and Muguna have each been handed Sh1.6 fine in addition to four-match bans.
luo: Komiti machiwo Kum e CAF ne ogoyo Oluoch gi Muguna fain mar milion 1.6 kendo otamgi tugo opira e tuke ang'wen.

eng: K'Ogalo have also been ordered to foot the cost of repairs at the Heroes Stadium in Lusaka.
luo: Ochik tim mar K'Ogalo mondo ochul pesa milosogo kuonde mokethore e Heroes Stadium man Lusaka.

eng: "Gor Mahia are instructed to immediately check the cost of the damages incurred by NAPSA Stars and reimburse the cost of damages caused by the players," reads the ruling by the CAF's Disciplinary Board.
luo: Bura machiwo kum e CAF ne owacho kama, "Wachiko Gor Mahia mondo ginon mapiyo ni kuonde mokethore romo nade to dhi dwaro pesa adhi kae to gichul pesa."

eng: This is not the first time K’Ogalo have found themselves on the wrong side of the CACF rules.
luo: Ma ok e kinde mokwongo ma Gor Mahia otimo gima ketho chike CAF.

eng: In 2019, the record Kenyan champions were fined Sh750,000 failing to control their players in a CAF Confederation Cup home game against Motema Pembe of DRC Congo.
luo: E higa mar 2019, ne ogo Gor Mahia fain mar siling 750,000 nikech jutogi ne okelo tulo e tuke CAF ma ne otim gi Motema Pembe e piny DRC Congo.

eng: In 2019, CAF once again slapped K'Ogalo with a Sh1.5million fine for crowd trouble after a section of fans were caught on camera throwing objects in the field during a CAF Confederation Cup against Algerian side, NA Hussein Dey.
luo: E higa mar 2019 kendo, CAF ne ochako ogoyo K'Ogalo fain mar milion achiel gi nus nikech johera mag K'Ogalo ne wito gik moko kuom NA Hussein Dey mar Algeria sama ne itugo tuke mag CAF Confederation Cup.

eng: KCB capitalised on Tusker and AFC Leopards slip up to go on top of the FKF Premier League table after thrashing Bandari 3-0 at Utalii Grounds yesterday.
luo: Nikech Tusker kod AFC Leopards ne ok otimo maber, KCB oidho ngas e FKF Premier League bang' loyo tim mar Bandari adek kuom ling' thi e pap mar Utalii nyoro.

eng: Having watched Tusker and AFC Leopards drop two points each following their draws with Wazito (1-1) and Posta Rangers (0-0) respectively, the bankers needed a win to dislodge the brewers from the summit.
luo: Tusker ne olalo alama ariyo kane oyudo gol marom gi Wazito (1-1), AFC Leopard be ne olalo alama ariyo bang' wuok hach hach gi Posta Rangers (0-0), omiyo ne dwarore ni KCB olo tugo achiel mondo gigol timbe mamoko e namba ma gin-go e lig.

eng: And they did that in style with David Simiyu, Harun Thomas and substitute Derrick Otanga’s goals helping the bankers avenge last season’s double loss against the dockers and consequently return to the top of the table.
luo: KCB ne olocho ma gibedo namba achiel e lig ka ne giyudo gonde adek moa kuom David Simiyu, Harun Thomas kod Derrick Otanga ma ne omi sab.

eng: The emphatic victory saw Zedekiah ‘Zico’ Otieno’s boys take their points tally to 36, one ahead of Tusker and three more than third placed AFC as the race for CAF Champions League qualification hots up.
luo: Loch ma ne giyudono ne omiyo jotugo mag Zedekiah 'Zico' Otieno obedo gi alama 36, ma ohingo mag Tusker gi achiel to ohingo alama mag AFC ma en namba adek sama weche tedore ka ji ikore ni CAF Champions League.

eng: Though Otieno was pleased with his side’s performance, he played down their chances of securing their maiden Champions League ticket this season.
luo: Kata obedo ni Oteno ne mor gi kaka tugo nobet, ne ok gikawo thuolo ma ne gin-go mar dhi hango tugo e Champions League.

eng: “Even though we are focused on our next game against Sofapaka, it is our hope and prayer that we maintain the position until June 30. We are just taking one game at a time,” said Otieno.
luo: Otieno nowacho niya, "Kata obedo ni sani waikore ni tugo mochomowa gi Sofapaka, walemo kendo wageno ni ok wabi wuok e namba ma wantie nyaka Jun 30. Wadwaro ni walo tugo achiel achiel ka wasudo.

eng: “I’m satisfied with the result and proud of my players’ performance today. We stepped up against Bandari after a slow start in the Mathare United game. Winning 3-0 against a team of Bandari calibre at this point of league means we are a good team. The players know what’s at stake and I feel that’s a sweet revenge after Bandari took six points from us last season.”
luo: Amor ahinya gi kaka jotuga maga ne otugo kawuono. Ne waloyo jo Bandari kata obedo ni ne ok wachako maber ka ne wagocho gi Mathare United. Loyo Jo Bandari gi gonde adek kuom nono nyiso ni wan tim maber. Jotugo ong'eyo gima dwarore kendo aneno ni ne wachulo kuor maber nikech Bandari ne omayowa alama auchiel higa mokalo."

eng: It took only 15 minutes for David Simiyu to break the deadlock when he capitalised on the dockers’ defensive error to easily tap home Reagan Otieno’s delivery from the left flank before Henry Onyango missed a golden chance in the 21st minute.
luo: David Simiyu ne oloyo gol mokwongo mana bang' dakika 15 ka ne oneno ka Jo Bandari ok ogeng'o gol margi mogweyo opira matek gi kama Reagan Otieno ne nitie gi koracham bende Henry Onyango ne olalo thuolo makende ahinya e dakika mar 21.

eng: But five minutes later, Thomas Harun beat goalkeeper Justin Ndikumana from close range after the visitors’ defence failed to clear David Owino’s free kick.
luo: Kata kamano, bang' dakika abich, Thomas Harun ne oloyo golkipa Justin Ndikumana ka ne Jo Bandari ok ogeng'o opira ma ne omi David Owino thuolo mar free kick.

eng: Simiyu nearly bagged his second goal of the day when he pounced on a loose ball in the area only for the former Vihiga United man to feebly shoot straight at Bandari goalkeeper.
luo: Simiyu ne chiegni loyo gonde mar ariyo ka ne oyudo opira machiegni gi golkipa en mana ne ogweyo opir tir modhi ne golkipa mar Bandari.

eng: Sensing danger, Bandari coach Cassa Mbungo made a tactical change bringing on striker Umar Kasumba for centre half Brian Otieno on the half hour mark.
luo: Koch mar Bandari, Cassa Mbugo, ne oneno ka weche ok dhi maber omiyo nowilo jatugo madiere Brian Otieno kigoye sab gi straika Umar Kasumba bang' nus sa.

eng: Kasumba nearly made an instant impact after he earned a free-kick for the dockers but William Wadri’s attempt was easily gathered by KCB goalkeeper Joseph Ochuka.
luo: Kasumba ne chiegni kelo lokruok mapiyo ka ne omiye thuolo mar gweyo opira nono en mana ni Willian Wadri mane opira odhine ne ogweyo eto golpika mar KCB, Joseph Ochuka omako opirano e yo mayot.

eng: One of KCB defenders almost conceded an own goal while trying to clear Willian Wadri’s cut-back in the 40th minute before Kasumba missed a sitter following a goal mouth melee from Hassan Abdallah’s corner kick.
luo: Achiel kuom jotugo mag KCB ne chiegni loyore giwegi kane otemo dwoko opira mane Wllian Wadri ogweyo e dakika mar 40 ka ne pok Kasumba ouso gol mane yot yudo sama ne Hassan Abdallah ogoyo kona.

eng: The bankers continued from where they left off in the first half with Curtis Wekesa almost extending the lead in the 58th minute after a brilliant run on the right flank.
luo: Jo KCB ne odhi nyime gi tugo ka ne giweyo e kare mokwongo ka Curtis Wekesa ne chiegni medogi gol machielo.

eng: Bandari responded after ten minutes, but Kasumba’s shot at the edge of the box was deflected for a fruitless corner before Wekesa missed another open scoring chance on the opposite end.
luo: Bandari notemo kendo bang' dakika apar, kata kamano, opira ma ne Kasumba ogweyo ne olokore kona kae to kendo Wekesa noweyo thuolo majaber obaye mar loyo gol.

eng: Derrick Otanga then came off the bench to put the game beyond the dockers reach when he perfectly connected Michael Oduor’s cross from the right flank in the 82nd minute.
luo: Derrick Otanga ma ne omi sab ne odonjo e pap momedo gol machielo kane Michael Oduor ogoyone opira ma ochomo opirano tir e gol  gi korachwich e dakika mar 82.

eng: Elsewhere, Frank Ouna picked up his first point as Mathare United coach after the Slum Boys held Nzoia Sugar to a 2-2 draw in Bungoma.
luo: Komachielo, Frank Ouna ne oyudo alama mare mokwongo kaka koch mar Mathare United bang' jo Mathare wuok marom Bungoma gi tim mar Nzoia Sugar kama giduto ne giloyo gol ariyo.

eng: Gor Mahia striker, Caleb Otieno [left] and Congo Boys defender, Musa Binedu fight for control of the ball during the Football Kenya Federation Cup match played at Mbaraki Sports Club .
luo: Straika mar Gor Mahia, Caleb Otieno [koracham] kod jatugo mar Congo Boys, Musa Bineda laro opira sama gitugo ka gin Mbaraki Sports Club e tugo mar Football Kenya Federation Cup.

eng: Ten-man Gor Mahia put aside their financial worries to thrash Congo Boys 3-0 and advance to the next round of the FKF Betway Cup.
luo: Gor Mahia ma nigi jotugo apar ne oloyo tim mar Congo Boys adek kuom ling' thi to mano miyo gidhi e okang' machielo mar FKF Betway Cup.

eng: Tito Okello, John Macharia and Clifton Miheso scored a goal each for the winners.
luo: Tito Okello, John Macharia kod Clifton Miheso noloyo gol achiel achiel ne Gor Mahia.

eng: Okello scored in the 37th minute after he connected with a high ball pass from former Bandari defender and Ugandan import Fred Nkata to beat advancing Congo Boys custodian Edwin George.
luo: Okello ne oloyo gol bang' dakika 37 sama noyudo opich amalo koa kuom Fred Nktata machon ne en difenda mar Bandari, kendo opira mane ogweyono ne otamo Edwin George mako,  ma en golkipa mar Congo Boys.

eng: However, the Premier League champions were reduced to 10 men after defender Sydney Wahongo was shown a straight red card for a dangerous play on Hussein Abdul in the 43rd minute.
luo: Kata kamano, tim mar Gor Mahia ne odong' gi jotugo apar bang' ka difenda margi, Sydney Wahongo ne oyudo kad makwar nikech ne otugo marach ne Hussein Abdul e dakika mar 43.

eng: Macharia pounced on a rebound to add the second goal in the 50th minute for the Gor side coached by Vaz Pinto. Gor surged ahead with the third goal in the 66th minute by Miheso.
luo: Macharia ne oloyo gol mar ariyo ne tim mar Gor ma koch mare en Vaz Pinto bang' dakika 50. Gor noyudo gol mar adek koa kuom Miheso e dakika mar 66.

eng: The winner of the tournament qualifies for the Caf Confederation Cup.
luo: Joma olocho e tugone dhi nyime tugo e Caf Confederation Cup.

eng: Gor Mahia could have missed the match due to financial constraints after they were stranded in Wundanyi, Taita Taveta County, where they had beaten Sofapaka 2-1 in an FKF Premier League match.
luo: Tugono ne chiegni bayo jo Gor Mahia nikech bedo maonge pesa bang' ka ne gisediwo Wundanyi, e kaonti mar Taita Taveta kama ne giloyo tim mar Sofapaka gi gol ariyo kuom achiel e tugo mar FKF Premier League.

eng: However, Lady Luck smiled on them after a Mombasa businessman Suleiman Shahbal came to the rescue of the record Kenyan champions.
luo: Kata kamano, hapgi nobedo maber kane ja ohala mawuok Mombasa, Suleiman Shahbal ne obiro moresogi.

eng: The businessman bailed out K’Ogalo by paying for their travel to Mombasa for the rescheduled FKF Betway Cup Round 64 match.
luo: Ja ohalano ne ochulo ne jo K'Ogalo pes wuoth ma gichopo Mombasa kama ne gitugo tugo alap mar 64 mar FKF Betway Cup.

eng: Gor Mahia chairman Ambrose Rachier and Team Manager Jolawi Obondo thanked Shabhal for catering for the team’s transport, accommodation.
luo: Jakom mar Gor Mahia, Ambrose Rachier kod meneja mar tim, Jolawi Obondo nogoyo erokamano ne Shahbal ma ne ochulonegi pes wuoth kod kar nindo.

eng: “Gor Mahia’s management called me seeking help on accommodation, and because I was aware of their match against Congo Boys, that was to give our coast boys the much-needed exposure, I thought it was only fair to help Gor Mahia honour this match as one way of supporting sports in this country,” Shahbal said.
luo: Shahbal nowacho kama, "Jotend Gor Mahia nogona simo gidwaro mondo akonygi, to nikech ne ang'eyo tugo margi gi Congo Boys, ma ne dhi miyo jotugo mantie Coast ong'ere. Naneno ni en gimaber konyo Gor Mahia chopo e tugoni nikech mano en achil kuom yo manyalo sirogo tuke e pinywa."

eng: Ulinzi Stars on Saturday ended Kariobangi Shark’s five match unbeaten run after defeating them 2-0 in a tight Football Kenya Federation Premier League match played in Narok.
luo: Ulinzi stars chieng' Ngeso ne oloyo tim mar Kariobangi Sharks ma osebedo ka locho e tuke abich moluwore, ne giloyogi gi gol ariyo kuom nono e tugo mar Football Kenya Federation Premier League ma ne otimore Narok.

eng: Keeper James Saruni put up a man of the match performance as Ulinzi ended their four match winless run, a result that saw them move above the mid-table to eighth for the moment.
luo: Golkipa James Saruni ne opwo ahinya ka ne jo Ulinzi Stars olocho bang' bedo maonge loch e tuke ang'wen, mano ne omiyo gibedo namba aboro e lig.

eng: Masita Masuta and Clinton "Aguero" Omondi each netted in the opening half to inspire the soldiers to their fourth win of the campaign.
luo: Masita Masuta kod Clinton "Aguero" Omondi ema noloyo gondego kendo mano nobedo loch margi mar ang'wen.

eng: The victory gets Ulinzi to 21 points from 17 matches played, 14 points behind leaders Tusker.
luo: Lojno miyo Ulinzi obedo gi alama 21 e tuke 17 ma gisetugo, to tim mar Tusker oloyogi gi alama 14.

eng: The match started on a high note with both teams attempting for early goals but by the time the referee stopped the match in the 22nd minute for the first water break, no goal had been scored.
luo: Tugo ne otedore maliet sama ne gichako ka tim duto temo manyo gol kata kamano, sama ne refari okudho firimbi e dakika mar 22, onge gol ma ne oselo.

eng: However, that would change at the half hour mark after Masuta netted past a helpless Brian Bwire in goal for Sharks.
luo: Kata kamano, weche nolokore bang' nus sa ka ne Masuta oloyo gol ma ne obayo Brian Bwire mako.

eng: Ten minutes later, Ulinzi would take a healthy two goal cushion to the breather after Omondi scored in the 39th minute to give Ulinzi a 2-0 lead.
luo: Dakika apar bang'e, tim mar Ulinzi noyudo gonde ariyo ka pok gidhi e yueyo  bang' Omondi loyo dakika mar 39, to mano nomiyo timno obedo nyime gi gonde ariyo kuom nono.

eng: In the final half, Sharks attempted to come back into the match but their numerous attempts were kept at bay by the excellent Saruni in goal for Ulinzi.
luo: Bang' yueyo tim mar Sharks notemo mondo gin bende gilo mak mana ni Saruni ma en jarit goal ne ok omiyo gi thuolo.

eng: Shark’s disappointing day was summed up in the 89th minute when substitute Robert Onyango’s goal was ruled out with Ulinzi holding on to win 2-0.
luo: Odiechieng' ne ok odhi maber ne tim mar Shark bang' gol mane olo e dakika mar 89 kod jatugo Robert Onyango ma noduog e pap ne ok okwan, omiyo opira norumo ka en gonde ariyo kuom nono.

eng: Ulinzi will now prepare to face Western Stima next in Kisumu.
luo: Ulinzi koro ikore romo gi tim mar Western Stima e alap ma Kisumo.

eng: Lucy Mukhwana goals inspire Ulinzi Starlets in seven goal-thriller
luo: Gond Lucy Mukhwana nochwalo tim mar Ulinzi Starlets olo gonde abiriyio te.

eng: Mukhwana’s hat trick in the opening 16 minutes of match was enough to unsettle the Slum Queens who have now conceded 15 goals in the two legs after previously losing 9-1 in the first leg.
luo: Gonde adek ma be iluongo ni hat trick mag Mukhwana bang' mano oloo gi dakika 16 noromo tieko tim mar Mathare ma bende iluongo ni Slum Queens ma koro oselo gonde 15 ka tukgi mokwongo ne ologi gonde ochiko kuom achiel.

eng: Mukhwana opened the scores with her first strike on goal in the 6th minute giving Ulinzi Starlets an early lead.
luo: Mukhwana noloyo gonde mokwongo bang' dakika 6 ka mano miyo tim mar Ulinzi Starlets obed nyime ka sa pod nyako.

eng: Seven minutes later, Mukhwana grabbed her brace after she outplayed Mathare United Women’s defense to bag the second goal for Ulinzi Starlets.
luo: Dakika abiriyio bang'e, Mukhwana noloyo ne timgi gol mar ariyo bang' dang'o jotugo machien ma Mathare United Women.

eng: Mukhwana summed up her hat-trick in the 16th minute when she converted a free kick with a header that landed the ball to the back of the net.
luo: Mukwana noloyo gonde mar adek dakika mar 16  bang' goyo opich free kick gi wiye modonjo e i net.

eng: Mukhwana went for a haul through her goal in the 22nd minute giving Ulinzi Starlets their fourth goal.
luo: Mukhwana nodhi nyime loyo ne Ulinzi Starlets gol mar ang'wen e dakika mar 22.

eng: Siliya Rasoha first shot on target for Ulinzi Starlets in the 36th minute saw Ulinzi closing the first half with a comfortable 5-0 score line.
luo: Gol mokwongo mar Siliya Rasoha e dakika mar 36 ne omiyo ulinzi starlets loch e kare mokwongo ka timni nigi gonde abich to jowetegi ni nono (5-0).

eng: After the breather, Emily Egesa netted the sixth goal for Ulinzi Starlets with Emma Wainaina’s goal for Mathare United Women in the 87th minute summing up as a consolation goal with the full time whistle sealing the scores at 6-1.
luo: Bang' kinde yueyo, Emily Egesa noloyo ne Ulinzi Starlets gol mar auchiel ka Emma Wainaina noloyo ne Mathare United Starlets gol achiel mar yueyo pii wang' e dakika mar 87 mane omiyo opira orumo ka gin auchiel kuom achiel.

eng: Kisumu All Stars are confident of closing the gap on log leaders FC Talanta when they face Kibera Black Stars on Saturday (today) at Ligi Ndogo Grounds in Nairobi.
luo: Kisumu All Stars nigi adier ni ka giromo gi Kibera Black Stars e tugo ma ibiro go Ligi Ndogo Grounds e boma ma Nairobi, to gibiro duoko chien points ma tim mar FC Talanta oloyogigo, ka mano e tim man nyime nyaka sani

eng: Speaking to The Standard Sports, All Stars captain Bobby Kwaka said their journey of returning back to the topflight league starts against Kibera.
luo: Bobby Kwaka ma e kaptain mar All Stars, nowuoyogi The Standard Sport kowacho ni giramo mar bedo nyime e tuke mag opira, kendo gidhi chako timo mano kuom goyo tim ma Kibera.

eng: “Nothing beats playing in the premier league. As a team, our objective is to achieve that goal and we start the ascending with a win against Kibera,” he said.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Onge gima duong' ma dilo gocho e lig ma malo. Kaka jotugo, waramo ni mano e gima wadwaro kendo nyako walo timb Kibera mondo mano onyalre."

eng: Despite not playing competitively since March 26 when sports was suspended again, Kwaka said they are more than ready for the league than before after working out some of their earlier problems.
luo: Kata obedo ni pok gitugo ka gipiem gi timbe mamoko chakre Mach 26 ka ne ochak ochor nyime weche tuke, Kwaka nowacho ni giikore mokalo ne tugo e lig moloyo kinde moro amora bang' tiekore gi weche moko ma ne chandogi kinde mokalo.

eng: “I think it has been to our advantage to some sort because we learnt new things during the break. The coach also never had enough time for pre-season so we utilised the two months,” Kwaka added.
luo: Nomedo wacho kama: "Aparo ni yueyo ma ne wabedogo okonyo malich nikech nitie gik ma wapuonjore. Jatiekwa bende ne onge gi thuolo moromo ka pok wachako tugo, omiyo ne watiyo maber gi dweche ariyogo."

eng: Kisumu All Stars are seventh with 25 points, a point behind Kibera who are joint fifth with Fortune Sacco with 26 points.
luo: Kisumu All Stars nigi points 25 kendo gin namba abiriyio, ka oyombgi gi point achiel gi tim ma Kibera kod Fortune Sacco ma nigi points 26 moro ka moro ka timbe ariyogo duto omako namba abich.

eng: Elsewhere, Migori Youth captain Clifford Otieno said they are seeking their second consecutive away win when they play Coast Stima today in Mombasa.
luo: Komachielo, kaptain mar Migori Youth nowacho ni mondo giyud loch mar ariyo gibiro thuthni kar ma ginyalo mondo gilo tim mar Coast Stima kawuono e boma ma Mombasa.

eng: Stima are coming off a disappointing 2-0 defeat to relegation threatened Muranga Seals as Migori earned an impressive 2-0 victory over hosts Mwatate United during the rescheduled matches played in midweek.
luo: Tim mar Stima oloo 2-0 gi Muranga Seals mane ochiegni gol oko, ka bende Migori noloyo tim mar Mwatate United gonde ariyo kuom nono(2-0) e paw tim mar Mwatate United e kor jumani.

eng: “We are very confident and beefed up after a massive win in midweek and we expect to play even more against Stima. It won’t be easy but we have the momentum already,” said Otieno.
luo: Otieno nowacho kama: "Wan gi chir kendo waikore maber bang' loch e kor juma kendo wageno ni wabiro tugo maber moloyo ka wagocho gi Stima. Ok bi bedo mayot, to wan gi mijing'o sani malich."

eng: Three more matches are on the cards on Saturday as round 18 is expected to kick off with 10 teams playing for the first time since March.
luo: Ochan Tuke adek chieng' Ngeso ka igeno ni raond mar 18 biro chakre gi timbe 10 ma pok ogocho chakre Due mar Adek.

eng: Bottom placed Mt. Kenya United FC will host third placed Vihiga Bullets FC at Camp Toyoyo.
luo: Tim mar Mt. Kenya United FC ma sani oywa boto biro gocho gi Vihiga Bullets FC ma gi sani omako namba adek, e alap ma Camp Toyoyo.

eng: Soy United host Gusii FC at Bukhungu Stadium as Silibwet entertain Modern Coast Rangers in Bomet Stadium.
luo: Soy United to biro gocho gi Gusii FC e paw Bukhungu Stadium ka Silibwet biro rakore gi Modern Coast Rangers e alap ma Bomet Stadium.

eng: FKF Premier League: Robert Matano left fuming after Tusker drop points against Wazito
luo: FKF Premier League: Robert Matano wuok ka iye owang' bang' tim mar Wazito miyo Tusker  lalo points.

eng: This was the second consecutive stalemate for the brewers after they were held to a barren draw by second placed KCB on the first weekend of the resumption of the league.
luo: Ma ne en kinde mar ariyo ma ne oridnegie ngima bang' wuok amodhi g'amodhi (0-0) gi tim mar KCB ma sani namba ariyo nyaka ne chak weche tuke kendo e giko juma.

eng: The result took Tusker’s points tally to 35, two ahead of the bankers, who tackle fifth-placed Bandari in Utalii on Saturday.
luo: Mano nomiyo tim mar Tusker obedo gi points 35 ka giloyo KCB ma bankno e ma siro gi points ariyo kende. Tim mar KCB notugo gi Bandari ma gin namba abich, e alapma Utalii chieng' Ngeso.

eng: Sammy Meja gave Tusker an early lead in the fourth minute through a deflected free kick before Kevin Kimani capitalised on goalkeeper Emery Mvuyekure’s howler to score a 19th minute equaliser.
luo: Sammy Meja nokwongo loyo ne jo Tusker e dakika mar ang'wen bang' jatugo machielo miye opira ma nogo free kick chomo kamaro nono, ka pok Kevin Kimani olocho ne time dakika mar 19 bang' jarit gol Emery Mvuyekure keto oyuma e dho gol, to mano nomiyo tugono orumo ka gin gol achiel achiel.

eng: While Matano was left fuming with the result, his Wazito counterpart Francis Kimanzi heaped praised on his players.
luo: Konchiel, Matano ne ok mor gi dwokogo kata matin, to komachielo, Francis Kimanzi ma tiego Wazito to ne pwoyo jotuke malich!

eng: “It’s like we lost the game. Those are two dropped points because we conceded a very easy goal. There was some fighting spirit, but I feel registering two draws in a row is not good for us,” said a visibly disappointed Matano.
luo: Matano nowacho kama: "Chal ka gima olowa. Walalo points ariyo e yo mofuwo malich. Chunywa to ne ni e tugo adier, to yudo point achiel achiel e tuke ariyo moluwore ok long'o." Nowuoyo ka ok omor kata matin.

eng: “I also think the referee made unnecessary calls and water break in the second half affecting the momentum and the rhythm of the game. All the same, we are looking forward to improve in our next match.”
luo: Nomedo wacho niya: "Aparo ni refari bende nodwa goyo firimbi ding'eny ahinya komiyo jotugo thuolo mar modho pi e kare mar ariyo mar tugo to mano nomiyo tugo chot chot kolalo mitne. To onge mana wach, wabo timo maber moloyo e tukwa ma luwo."

eng: Tusker's Sammy Miseh (left) and Musa Masika of Wazito FC during an FKF Premier League match at Utalii Sports Club on Friday, May 21, 2021.
luo: Sammy Miseh (koracham) jatuk Tusker kod Masika ma tugo ne Wazito FC e piem mag FKF Premier League ka ne tugo dhi nyime chieng' Tich Abich May 2021 e alap ma Utalii Sport Club.

eng: On the other hand, Kimanzi said: “I’m really proud of my players’ effort. Coming from a goal down to get a point from the league leaders means that we are learning very quickly. We could have won the game if we had maintained the same intensity we had in the first half.”
luo: Komachielo, Kimanzi nowacho kama: " Amor ahinya gi kaka jotuka notugo. Bedo ni Tusker e namba achiel kendo ne giseloyowa to waduogo ma waloyogi mi waromore nyiso ni ok wanind e klas. De waloyo tugono dabed ni warido iye kaka ne watimo e thuolo mokwongo."

eng: But Wazito were forced to make an early substitution in the seventh minute when central defender Benard Ochieng replaced the injured Maurice Ojwang.
luo: Nochuno tim mar Wazito olok jatukgi momondo e dakika mar abiriyio ka ne Benard Ochieng' ma tugo chien kawo kar Maurice Ojwang ma a ohinyore.

eng: Kimani then pounced on a rebound after the Rwandan goalkeeper failed to deal with Amos Asembeka’s feeble long range shot.
luo: Kae to Kimani orodhno gi opira ma jarit gol ma Ja-Rwanda ong'udho bang' Amos Asembeka goyo opira moa mabor mi oloyo.

eng: Wazito almost went ahead in the 34th minute, but Rogers Aloro reacted fast to intercept a cross for a fruitless corner.
luo: Poth ka tim mar Wazito obedo nyime e dakika mar 34, kata kamano, Rogers Aloro noriyore mi ogeng'o ma nogo koa e kona mondo kik loye.

eng: Tusker responded immediately, but Christopher Ochieng’s glancing header from Luke Namanda’s delivery went over the bar before Boniface Muchiri forced a fine save from Wazito goalkeeper Levis Opiyo.
luo: Tusker be both koloyo mapiyo bang' mano, to Christopher Ochieng' nogoyo head mobaro mpira ma Luke Namanda ogoyo kendo Boniface Muchiri noriyore moreso mpiro ma nodhi malo mar golno kata ka Levis Opiyo ma e jarit gond jotuk Wazito otimo gimoro.

eng: The brewers came close to regaining the lead on the stroke of halftime only for defender Kevin Monyi to scuff his effort in the area.
luo: Tim mar Tusker ne chiegni bedo nyime kendo mana matin ka pok ogo firimb dhi yueyo, to Kevin Monyi ma tugo chien nomonogi yudo thuolo mar riwo e dho gol.

eng: Namanda then saw his powerful shot kept out by Opiyo as both sides continued searching for the winning goal in vain.
luo: Namanda be nodhier nono neno ka Opiyo ma rito gol ng'eng'o opiche ma nogoyo matek. Moro ka moro kuom timbe ariyogo nodhi nyime manyo loch to onge.

eng: Saturday’s matches will see Kakamega Homeboyz clash with Western Stima at Bukhungu Stadium as Ulinzi Stars and Kariobangi Sharks battle in Narok.
luo: Opiche mibiro go chieng' Ngeso biro bedo e kind Kakamega Homeboyz ma biro gocho gi Western Stima e alap ma Bukhungu Stadium ka Ulinzi Stars to biro gocho gi Kariobangi Sharks e taon ma Narok.

eng: The result took Tusker’s points tally to 35, two ahead of KCB, who tackle fifth-placed Bandari in Utalii on Saturday.
luo: Dwokogo nomiyo Tusker obedo gi points 35, to giloyo KCB gi points ariyo. KCB biro gocho gi Bandari ma gin namba abich chieng' Ngeso e pap ma Utalii.

eng: Nzoia Sugar coach Shikanda coach calls for response after Ingwe defeat
luo: Shikanda, jatieg tim mar Nzoia Sugar nigi geno bang' Ingwe loyo time

eng: Nzoia Sugar coach Ibrahim Shikanda has called on his side to bounce back from their 1-0 defeat to AFC Leopards when they host Mathare United in Sunday’s FKF Premier League match at Sudi Stadium.
luo: Jatieg tim mar Nzoia Sugar Ibrahim Shikanda ojiwo timne mondo otimie gimoro bang' tim mar AFC Leopards loyogi gol achiel kuom nono. Nokonogi ni gitim kamano e kinde ma gibiro gocho

eng: The millers were made to pay for their wastefulness after Caleb Olilo scored a screamer to inflict a sixth defeat of the season on the 14th placed Nzoia.
luo: Nzoia ma sani namba 14, noketo oyuma to mano nomiyo Caleb Olilo oloyo opira. Lo ma nologo timno en mar auchiel e season ma dhi nyimeni.

eng: “Profligacy in front of goal cost us the game. I was disappointed with my players’ response in the game, they didn’t play as per instructions,” said Shikanda. “I feel the break also affected our performance.
luo: Shikanda nowacho kama: "Oyuma nomakowa e dho gol momiyo olowa. Jotuka ne ok omora kata matin e yo ma ne gitugogo kendo ne ok gitugo kaka nochikgi. Bedo ni pok ogoch kuom kinde malach ne nyalo miyo mano otimre be."

eng: FKF Premier League leaders Tusker feeling the pressure - Muchiri
luo: Piny diny ne Tusker ma sani okawo namba e tuke mag FKF Premier League - Muchiri

eng: Tusker midfielder Boniface Muchiri has admitted that they are feeling the pressure of being at the top of the FKF Premier League.
luo: Boniface Muchiri ma gocho e dier pap ne tim mar Tusker ogo bade piny ni sani piny dinynegi nikech gin e ma gikwao namba.

eng: The brewers, who were held to a barren draw by title rivals KCB last weekend, take on Wazito in today’s fixture at Utalii Grounds.
luo: Tim mar KCB ma bende laro kodgi okombe kendo notuore kodgi amodhi gamodhi ka ne gikocho giko juma mokalo, biro gocho gi tim mar Wazito kawuono e alap ma Utalii Grounds.

eng: “We didn’t get the desired results against KCB, but I feel we can do that in the coming few games,” said Muchiri.
luo: Muchiri nowacho kama: "Ne ok wayudo loch ma nwadwaro ka ne wagocho ni KCB, to aparo wanyalo timo mano e tukewa ma luwo."

eng: “There is always the pressure of being at the top but it is making us work extra hard because if we drop more points our opponents will catch up with us.
luo: Kinde mang'eny ka in mbele jomamoko to weche ok bedga mayot nikech gidwa ni giyudi to mano miyo watiyo matek ahinya nimar ka walalo points, to jowetewa biro jukowa."

eng: The more we get the maximum points, the more relaxed we become.”
luo: Kaka wamedo yudo points momedore e kaka wamedo bedo mofwong'ore."

eng: Tusker midfielder Boniface Muchiri dribbles the ball during their FKF Premier League match against KCB on May 15, 2021 at Ruaraka Grounds
luo: Jatuk Tusker ma tugoga e dier pap Boniface Muchiri goyo opira kinde ma ne gigocho gi KCB ma ne tarik 15 Mei 2021 e alap ma Ruaraka Grounds e piem milaroe okombe mar FKF Premier League

eng: Gor Mahia revived their chances of playing in the CAF Champions League next season thanks to a hard-fought 2-1 win over Sofapaka in today's FKF Premier League match in Taita Taveta.
luo: Gor Mahia oyudo geno mar tugo e CAF Champions League e season ma luwo bang' goyo Sofapaka 2-1 ka ne gitugo kawuono e taon ma Taita Taveta e laro okombe mar FKF Premier League.

eng: The match seemed to be heading for a 1-1 draw only for Alpha Onyango to score a last gasp goal from Tito Okello’s cross.
luo: Tugono ne nenore ni ne dhi rumo ka gin 1-1 to ka nochopo dakika mogik ogik Alpha Onyango oloyo bang' yudo opira ma Tito Okello noriwo.

eng: The third consecutive victory temporarily took the pressure off the shoulders of Portuguese tactician Manuel Vaz Pinto as the sixth-placed K’Ogalo took their points tally 25, two behind fifth-placed Bandari.
luo: Lojno nomiyo jatiekgi Manuel Vaz Pinto  ma a Portugese ofwong'oree matin ka mano en lochne mar adek. K'Ogalo koro namba auchiel ka gin gi points 25 ka Bandari ma sani namba abich oloyogi gi points ariyo.

eng: Batoto Ba Mungu remain ninth on the log with 19 points.
luo: Batoto ba Mungu pod odong' ka gin namba ochiko ka gin gi points 19.

eng: But despite the positive result at Wundanyi Stadium, Carlos Manuel Vaz Pinto knows he has his work cut out as Gor Mahia must at least win all their June fixtures and pray their opponents drop the points for them to earn the Champions League ticket.
luo: To kata obedo ni weche nodhinegi maber e pap ma Wundanyi Stadium, Carlos Manuel Vaz Pinto ong'eyo ni onego okony timno olo tuke duto ma gidong'go kendo gilem ni timbe man nyimgi olal points eka ginyalo yudo thuolo mar tugo e Champions League .

eng: On Monday, Football Kenya Federation (FKF) issued a directive saying that the team that will be on top of the standings by June 30 shall be declared the Kenyan representative at next season’s Champions League.
luo: Chieng' Wuok Tich Football Kenya Federation (FKF) nowuoyo ka wacho ni tim ma biro bedo namba achiel kochopo June 30 e ma ibo land ni bo dhi tugo e Champions  League season ma luwo e lo piny Kenya.

eng: But it was Sofapaka who started the game on a high note when Timothy Otieno almost punished his former club only for his tenth-minute effort to be easily gathered by goalkeeper Gad Mathews.
luo: To Sofapaka e ma nochako tugono ka liet ka jatukgi Timothy Otieno poth koloyo tim ma notugone chon e dakika    mar auchiel en mana ni jarit gol Gad Mathews ne omako opiche ma yom.

eng: South Sudan striker Tito Okello then broke the deadlock with a cool header past a hapless Togolese goalkeeper Abuol Moubarak Togolese in the 28th minute..
luo: Tito Okello ma en jatugo ma a South Sudan e ma nokwongo oloyo bang' tugono tuore kuom kinde ka nogoyo opira gi wiye mokalo jarit gol ma Togo miluongo ni Aboul Moubarak.

eng: Fullback Titus Achesa drew level in the 56th minute before Okello combined well with youthful Alpha Onyango for the winner in the 82nd minute.
luo: Titus Achesa ma tugo chien noduogo oloyo bang'e e dakika mar 56 ma timbego obedo ma romre. Kata kamano, Okello gi Alpha Onyango ma pod rawera malich otugo maber e kindgi mi giyudo gol e dakika mar 82.

eng: Gor Mahia FC's Alpha Onyango (left) and Michael Odongo of Vihiga FC during FKF PL match at Kasarani Stadium on Saturday, Jan 23, 2020
luo: Alpha Onyango ma tugo ne Gor Mahia FC (koracham) kod Michael Odongo ma Vihiga FC ka gitugo e paw Kasarani  chieng' Ngeso Jan 23, 2020 kilaro okombe ma FKF PL.

eng: Migori Youth captain Clifford Otieno is upbeat the club can finish among the top four clubs in the National Super League after resuming the second-tier league with a victory in one of the three rescheduled matches played on Wednesday.
luo: Kaptain ma Migori Youth Clifford Otieno nigi geno ni timgi nyalo tieko e kind timbe ang'wen mokwongo e National Super League bang' tuke e tielo mar ariyo chakore ka ne gilocho e tuke ma noduog ogo e kor juma chieng' Tich Adek.

eng: The South Nyanza based club defeated Mwatate United 2-0 to move out of the relegation zone up to 12th in the standings with 21 points from 17 matches played.
luo: Tim ma yudore e Milambo mar Nyanzani, noloyo Mwatate United 2-0 ka mano noresogi kik ng'udhgi e piem. Sani gin namba 12 ka gin gi points 21 bang' tugo tuke 17.

eng: Former Gor Mahia striker Dickson “Agwambo” Raila debuted with a goal in addition to Michael Bosco strike that sealed all three points for Migori.
luo: Jatuk Gor Mahia machon Dickson "Agwambo" Raila

eng: “We are very happy to come back home with all maximum points especially after another stressful two months out without football,” said Otieno during an interview with The Standard Sports.
luo: Otieno nowuoyo gi The Standard Sport kowacho kama: "Wamor ni bang' bedo pacho kuom dweche ariyo ka ok watugi kendo ka waparore, to wayudo points adek mopong'."

eng: “This win will come in handy ahead of our next matches which we have to win in order to be able to achieve our goal of finishing in the top four,” Otieno added.
luo: Otieno nomedo wacho niya: "Lojni biro konyowa e tuke ma luwo ma wabiro tugo, kendo dwarore ni walo tukego e ka watiek e kind timbe ang'wen mokwongo mana kaka wasebedo ka wagombo."

eng: Meanwhile, Vihiga Bullets closed the gap on joint leaders Kenya Police and FC Talanta to two points after narrowly edging out Fortune Sacco 1-0 in Kianyaga Stadium.
luo: Gie seche gogo, Vihiga Bullets noduoko chien points ma Kenya Polis kod FC Talanta oloyogigo bang' goyo Fortune Sacco 1-0 e pap ma Kianyaga Stadium.

eng: The victory saw Vihiga move to third in the standings with 30 points, two behind Kenya Police and FC Talanta who are tied on 32 points.
luo: Lojno nomiyo Vihiga obedo namba adek ka gin gi points 30, ma en points ariyo kende tok Kenya Police kodd FC Talanta ma moro ka moro nigi points 32.

eng: In Mombasa, Wilson Kamau scored a brace to inspire Muranga Seals to an important 2-0 victory over Coast Stima at Mbaraki Grounds.
luo: E taon ma Mombasa, Wilson Kamau noloyo gol ma nojiwo Muranga Seals oloyo Coast Stima 2-0 e paw Mbaraki Grounds.  Ne dwarore ahinya timno oyud loch.

eng: The win lifted Seals out of the relegation zone to 14th with 19 points.
luo: Lojno nokonyo kor Seals oa kama rach ma ne nyalo miyo giwuog e piemno ka koro sani gin namba 14 gi points 19.

eng: After round 17 of super league matches played, former Premier League side Mount Kenya United remain bottom of the table with 13 points followed by Soy United and Gusii FC AS Talanta, Kenya Police and Vihiga Bullets lead race for promotion.
luo: Bang' tuke 17 mosego e piem ma super league, tim mar Mount Kenya United ma chon ne ni e Premier League pod oywayo boto ka gin gi points 13 ka Gusii FC ni e wigi, ka koni to Talanta, Kenya Police kod Vihiga Bullets okawo nafas adek mokwongo kendo gin gi geno ni gibiro idho ngas.

eng: Five more matches are on the cards on Saturday as round 18 is expected to kick off with 10 teams playing for the first time since March.
luo: Ibiro tug tuke abich chieng' Ngeso ka itugo round mar 18 to timbe 10 e ka dhi chako tugo kendo chakre Mach.

eng: Accountant, matatu driver win in BangBet draws
luo: Akauntant kod derep matatu oloyo mich mar BanBet

eng: Evanson Kiprotich, winner of BangBet Casino Lucky Draws receives cheque from BangBet Marketing Manager Kelvin Maundu on Friday May 21, 2021.
luo: Evanson Kiprotich, ma e jaloch mar BangBet Casino Lucky Draws imiyo chek gi Marketing Manager mar BanBet Kelvin Maundi chieng' Tich Abich Mei 21 2020.

eng: Evanson Kiprotich and his family are set to be cushioned from the effects of the coronavirus pandemic after he clinched Sh500,000 courtesy of BangBet’s monthly Casino Lucky Draw.
luo: Evanson Kiprotich gi joode biro mong'o ngima kata obedo ni coronavirus oketho weche yuto. Mano en nikech Evanson nobedo jaloch jaloch mar BangBet Casino Lucky Draws michiwo dwe ka dwe kimiye siling' 500,000.

eng: The Muthiga resident, an accountant by profession, is one of those who suffered reduced earnings after his employer imposed a pay cut following the disruption the pandemic caused on businesses, but last Thursday, that pain was alleviated, thanks to BangBet.
luo: Odak Muthiga kendo en akauntant kendo an achiel kuom joma nong'ad osachgi bang' jatende wacho ni ong'ad misach ji nikech tuwo mar Korona norocho ohendni. Kata kamano, chieng' Tich Ang'wen mokalo noil ahinya bang' loyo mich mar jo BangBet.

eng: The Baringo native staked just Sh500 on his favourite Lucky football game and walked away with 1,000 times the amount following the monthly draw.
luo: Jago ma wuok Baringoni, notiyo mana gi siling' 500 e koro timb opira ma ne dhi locho kendo noyudo nyadi 1,000 pesa ma notiyogo e pim ma ichiwo ne jaloch pesa dwe ka dwe.

eng: Kiprotich has, however, had to endure numerous losses for the last year, having signed up to the BangBet Lucky Casino in May 2020, but he credits patience for the victory.
luo: Kata kamano, Kiprotich ne nyaka nan bang' yudo lal mathoth higa mokalo, tok riwore gi BanBet Lucky Casino Mei 2020, to omor ni nohore to mano e momiyo olocho.

eng: “I always knew that there is a season for winning and a season for defeat. That is why I did not give up,” said Kiprotich, who was accompanied by his wife, when he picked his cheque from BangBet Marketing Manager Kelvin Maundu on Friday.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Nang'eyo kinde duto ni nite kinde yuto kod kinde lal. Mano e momiyo ne chunya ok otho." Nowacho wechego chieng' Tich Abich ka ne en gi chiege ma nokkawo chek koa kuom  Kelvin Maundu ma e Marketing Manager mar BangBet

eng: His wife, who lost her job due to the pandemic, will now see her frustration turned into joy after Kiprotich revealed that he will use the money to start a business for her.
luo: Chiege ma nolalo tich nikech tuwo mar Korona nobedo mamor bang' Kiprotich wacho ni obiro yawo ne chiege ohala gi pesgo.

eng: Meanwhile, William Nyaga, a matatu driver, who lives in Githurai 45 walked away with Sh100,000 from last week’s Weekly Casino Draw.
luo: E sechegogo, William Nyaga ma en jariemb matatu kendo odak Githurai 45 noyudo siling' 100,000 e tuk Weekly Casino Draw michiwie pesa juma ka juma.

eng: “I will use the money to buy a bull and take it to my home county of Murang’a,” said the father of three, who staked Sh100 on his favourite game, Lucky Poker.
luo: En notiyo gi siling' 100 e temo hape e tuko mohero miluongo ni Lucky Poker. Wuon nyithindo adekno, nowacho kama: "Abiro nyiewo ruath gi pesgo kendo tero ruadhno korwa Murang'a."

eng: Sofapaka are upbeat about toppling Gor Mahia when they entertain the defending champions in a Football Kenya Federation Premier League match on Wednesday at Wundanyi Stadium in Taita Taveta.
luo: Safapaka mor ma tamre gi nono ni gidhi rakore gi Gor Mahia ma season mokalo ne namba ariyo e tuke laro okombe mar Football Kenya Federation Premier League chieng' Tich Adek e pap ma Wundanyi Stadium man Taita Taveta.

eng: Sofapaka sit ninth on the standings on 19 points from 15 matches knowing that victory will see them move level on points with sixth-placed K’Ogalo, a fete Sofapaka head coach Ken Odhiambo is keen to achieve.
luo: Sofapaka ma gie sani namba ochiko ka gin gi points 19 bang' tuke 15 ong'eyo ni ka gigoyo K'Ogalo ma sani namba auchiel, to gibiro romore kodgi to mano e gima koch mar Sofapaka Ken Odhiambo nigi adier ni gidhi timo.

eng: Speaking to The Standard Sports, Odhiambo said he trusts his players to maintain their winning form when they face Gor Mahia.
luo: Nowuoyo gi The Standard Sports kowacho ni en gadier ni jotuke biro locho kaka gisebedo ka gitimo seche ma gibiro tugo gi Gor Mahia.

eng: Riding high on the back of a commanding 2-0 victory over Wazito 2-0, Odhiambo believes players will be motivated when they face the champions.
luo: Komor gi loch ma ne gilogo Wazito 2-0, Odhiambo ni gi adier ni jotuke ok bi luor romo gi jotuk Gor.

eng: “The match against Gor will be very tricky considering the talent they have in the team. Despite that, we are ready for them. My boys are psyched up and raring to go and we can’t wait to hit the field,” Odhiambo said.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Loyo Gor ok yot kendo ok en tuk nyithindo, to ahinya ahinya ka irango jotugo molony ma gin-go. To pod waikorenegi. Jotuka oikorenegi, gin gi siso mar romo kodgi, gigombo ni girom kodgi e pap."

eng: Regarding Caf Champions League, Odhiambo said their focus is on their match against Gor Mahia and their matches to follow.
luo: Kowuoyo e wi Caf Champions League, Odhiambo nowacho ni pachgi ni e wi gocho gi Gor Mahia kod tukegi ma luwo.

eng: “Today we focus on Gor. Tomorrow we look at who is next in line. Our main objective as a tea is to win games, each at a time and then we will see how it goes when June 30 reaches,” Odhiambo added.
luo: Nomedo wacho kama: "Kawuono pachwa ni e gocho gi Gor. Kiny wanane ni en tim mane ma ni e nyimwa. Gima wadwaro en ni waloch e tukewa, moro bang' moro kae to wabo neno kaka weche biro chalo kochopo Jun 30."

eng: Gor are sixth in the standings with 22 points, 12 points behind leaders Tusker, a gap Gor assistant coach Sammy Omollo believes they can close.
luo: Gor nyaka sani ni e namba auchiel ka gin gi points 22. Mano points 12 tok Tusker ma sani okawo namba, to koch mar Gor Sammy Omollo ni gi yie ni Gor nyalo chopo kama Tusker nitieno.

eng: “I believe everything is achievable in football and to be top of the standings by the end of June is very much possible for us. Gor is a team with wealth in quality players and we are banking on them to lift the team up in the coming run of matches,” said the former KCB coach.
luo: Koch machon mar jo KCB-no nowacho kama: " An gadier ni e adhula ka, gimoro amora nyalore, kendo bedo namba achiel kochopo Jun en gima nyalore. Gor en tim ma nigi jotugo molony kendo wan gi yie ni jotugogo biro ting'o timwa malo e tuke ma wan-go nyime kae."

eng: “Sofapaka is a good team and we will have to be cautious too. I believe we had a good win against City Stars that will give players a boost today and we expect nothing but all three points,” Omollo added.
luo: Omollo nomedo wacho niya: "Sofapaka en tim maber to wabo bedo motang' be. An gadier ni ne wachako maber kuom loyo City Stars to mano biro jiwo jotukwa kawuono. Wadwaro points adek mopong'; onge gimoro mopogore gi mano."

eng: Record Kenyan Premier League champions Gor Mahia are confident of closing the gap on top-four teams when they face Sofapaka today’s FKF Premier League match in Wundanyi.
luo: Gor ma oseloyo okombe mar Kenyan Premier League nyading'eny moloyo tim moro amora, ni gadier ni gibiro duoko chien points ma timbe ang'wen man nyime oloyogigo sama gibiro gocho gi Sofapaka kawuono e alap m Wundanyi e tuke mag FKF premier League.

eng: Speaking to Standard Sports, Gor Mahia assistant coach Sammy Omollo said they must beat Sofapaka to keep their chances of topping the table by June 30 and play in the Caf Champions League.
luo: Koch ma Gor Mahia Sammy Omollo nowuoyo gi Standard Sport kowacho ni nyaka gigo Sofapaka e ka gibed gi geno mar bedo nyime kochopo Jun 30 kendo giyud thuolo mar tugo e Caf Champions League.

eng: Earlier this week, FKF said the team that will be on top of the Premier League standings by June 30, will represent Kenya in the 2021-22 CAF Champions League.
luo: Motelo jumani, FKF nowacho ni tim mar biro bedo nyime e laro okomb  Premier League kochopo Jun 30, e ma biro tugo ne Kenya e tuke ma CAF Champions League ma 2021-2022.

eng: “I believe everything is achievable in football and to be top of the standings by the end of June is possible. Gor is a team that has a lot of talented players and we are banking on them to lift the team up in the coming matches,” said Omollo.
luo: Omollo nowacho kama: "An gadier ni e adhula ka, gimoro amora nyalore, kendo bedo namba achiel kochopo Jun en gima nyalore. Gor en tim ma nigi jotugo molony kendo wan gi yie ni jotugogo biro ting'o timwa malo e tuke ma wan-go nyime kae."

eng: Sofapaka is a good team and we will have to be cautious too.
luo: Sofapaka en tim maber to wabo bedo motang' be.

eng: I believe we had a good win against City Stars, which is a boost ahead of our match.
luo: An gadier ni ne wachako maber kuom loyo City Stars to mano biro jiwo jotukwa.

eng: Player rotation will be key during this busy schedule for most teams.
luo: E kinde ma chenro othung'enie biro dwarore ni jotuke timbe owilre owilre.

eng: Meanwhile, former Harambee Stars assistant coach Frank Ouna started his reign at Mathare United on a losing note after the Slum Boys fell 2-1 to KCB at Ruaraka Grounds yesterday.
luo: Gie seche gogo, Frank Ouna ma chon  ne en jalup koch mar tim ma Harambee Stars kendo ma koro gie sani ochako tiego tiego tim mar Mathare United, nogo timbe ma be iluongo ni Slums Boys onge gonde ariyo kuom achiel (2-1) gi tim mar KCB e paw Ruaraka Grounds.

eng: The victory saw the bankers take their points tally to 33 and leapfrog AFC Leopards into the second as Mathare remain rooted at the bottom with seven points.
luo: Loch ma ne KCB oyudono nomiyo points maggi ochikore mobedo 33, ka mano miyo AFC Leopards odok chien mobedo namba ariyo ka Mathare to odong' koywayo goro ka gin mana gi points abiriyio.

eng: Daniel Otieno gave Mathare an early lead in the first minute only for Vincent Wasambo to cancel it on the stroke of halftime.
luo: Daniel Otieno e ma nokwongo oloyo e dakika mokwongo ka miyo Mathare obed nyime, to kodong' dakika matin to igo firimb dhi yueyo Vincent Wasambo noloyo ne timbe ma gibedo gi gonde ma romre.

eng: Derrick Otanga then scored the winner midway through the second half to help the bankers narrow the gap on league leaders Tusker one point.
luo: Derrick Otanga noduogo oloyo gol ma nomiyo KCB loch bang' timbego duogo a yueyo kendo tugo dakika piero ariyo gi gimoro; to mano nomiyo tim mar KCB omedo duoko chien points ma tim mar Tusker ma nyaka sani okawo namba oloyogigo.

eng: Migori Youth captain Clifford ‘Ouma’ Otieno is optimistic they can turn around their poor form and get back to winning ways when they face Mwatate United FC on Wednesday (today) as the National Super League resumes under strict COVID-19 protocols.
luo: Kaptain ma Migori Youth Clifford 'Ouma' Otieno nigi geno ni timgi nyalo timo maber bang' chako marach e kinde ma gibiro romo gi Mwatate United FC chieng' Tich Adek (kawuono) kinde ma piem mar e National Super League chakore kiluwo chike moketi motudore gi tuwo mar COVID 19.

eng: Three midweek super league fixtures are on the cards after an eight-week break in March when President Uhuru Kenyatta suspended sporting activities in the country to curb the rising cases of COVID-19.
luo: Bang' bedo e yueyo kuom jumbe aboro chakre Mach ka ne Ker President Uhuru Kenyatta choro nyime weche tuke mondo kik nya tuwo mar COVID 19, tugogo dhi chako kendo ka timbe adek gocho e kor juma.

eng: Speaking to The Standard Sports, Otieno believes they have what it takes to compete at the top level again, noting that the brief two months break will play a pivotal role in their rise once again.
luo: Otieno nowuoyo gi The Standard Sport kowacho ni ginyalo tieko tielogo e tielo ma nyime, koneno ni yueyo ma giseyueyogo kuom dweche ariyo biro miyogi mbi mar idho malo.

eng: “We are Migori Youth. The team is ready for the league battle once again we are going to do everything it takes to collect maximum points in Taita.”
luo: Nowacho kama: "Wan Migori Youth. Timwa oikore nyagore e tukegi kendo wadhi temo kar nyalowa mondo wayud points adek mopong' ka wan Taita."

eng: “We have been training well during the brief break where we tried to work out some of the few problems we faced during the opening 16 matches we played and I believe we are in a better positon than before,” Otieno said.
luo: Nomedo wacho niya: " Wasebedo ka watiegore maber e kinde yueyono kendo ne watemo loso gik ma ne chandowa e kinde tukewa 16 mokwongo kendo an gi geno ni sani wan maber moloyo kaka ne wan."

eng: After 16 matches in the second tier league, Migori are 17th with 18 points.
luo: Bang' tuke 16 e tielo mar ariyo, Migori nigi points 18 ka sani gin namba 17.

eng: Migori beefed up their squad with the acquisition of former Gor Mahia striker Dickson “Agwambo” Raila who is expected to make his debut today.
luo: Migori noyudo mijing'o bang' nyiewo Dickson "Agwambo" Raila ma ne jatuk Gor Mahia machon ma igeno ni dhi tugo tuke mokwongo kawuono.

eng: Mwatate are eighth with 25 points and a win will see them move to within four points of leaders FC Talanta.
luo: Mwatate to namba aboro ka gin gi points 25 to ka po ni giloyo to mano nyiso ni ibiro yombgi mana gi points ang'wen gi tim mar FC Talanta ma sani okawo namba.

eng: In Mombasa, 11th placed Coast Stima welcome relegation threatened Muranga Seals at Mbaraki Grounds as Vihiga Bullets seek to close the gap on leaders Talanta to two points when they travel to play Fortune Sacco who are a point behind them in the log.
luo: E boma mar Mombasa, Coast Stima ma sani namba 11 biro gocho ka gin pacho gi tim Muranga Seals e paw Mbaraki Grounds ma chop sani odong' mana matin to ogolgi oko e piem mag laro okombe, ka Vihiga Bullets gombo ni giduok points ma Talanta oloyogigo obed ariyo seche ma gimako safar mondo gidhi gigoch gi Fortune Sacco ka timno oloyogi mana gi point achiel.

eng: Kisumu Hot Stars striker Charles Adika (right) in action against Migori Youth.
luo: Jatuk Kisumu Hot Stars Charles Adika (korachwich) ka ne gitugo gi tim mar Migori Youth.

eng: Ex-Harambee Stars assistant coach Ouna left to pick up the pieces at Mathare
luo: Ouna ma chon ne en jalup koch mar Harambee Stars ikore mondo gidhi gilo tim mar Mathare.

eng: Former Harambee Stars assistant coach Frank Ouna was yesterday appointed Mathare United’s new head coach after Salim Ali was sacked alongside his assistant Patrick Gitagia.
luo: Frank Ouna ma chon ne en jalup koch mar Harambe Stars ne oyier nyoro mondo obed koch mar Mathare United bang' timno riembo kochgi Salim Ali gi jalupne Patrick Gitagia.

eng: The club’s management opted to make the changes in a bid to save the team from relegation.
luo: Timno notimo lokruok ma kamano mondo gires timgi kik gol e piem mar laro okombe ma iluongo gi Kisungu ni relegation.

eng: Ali, who took over from current Wazito coach Francis Kimanzi in 2018, has endured a difficult campaign this year.
luo: Weche ok osebedo ne Ali mayot higani nyaka nochak tiego timno e higa mar 2018 bang' kawo kar koch ma sani mar Wazito Francis Kimanzi .

eng: The Slum Boys are at a risk of being relegated at the end of the 2021 Football Kenya Federation Premier League season after failing to win their 14th match of the campaign as the local football league resumed over the weekend under strict Covid-19 protocols after seven weeks out.
luo: Tim mar Mathare ma be inyalo luong ni Slum Boys ni kama rach ka inyalo golgi e piem mar laro okombe mar Football Kenya Federation Premier League nikech ne ok giloyo tukgi mar 14 ka tuke nochakore kendo e giko juma mokalo ka iluwo chike ma thiro tuwo mar Covid 19 bang' bedo e yueyo kuom jumbe abiriyio.

eng: In his last match, Mathare played out to a 0-0 draw with Vihiga United, a result that left them bottom of the premier league standings with seven points.
luo: Tugo mogik ma ne Mathare ogochoe, ne ok giloyere gi Vihiga United (0-0) ka duokogo miyo gidong' bwoto ka gin gi points abiriyio kende.

eng: Mathare United CEO Jectone Obure said they had to take the drastic change for the sake of the team's future.
luo: CEO ma Mathare migosi Jectone Obure nowacho ni nochunogi kawo okang' mapiyo mondo gires timno.

eng: "We had to make some changes. The team has not been performing well this season and we made a tough decision to let Salim, our former player who has grown through the ranks, to go because of the poor results,” Obure said.
luo: Obure nowacho kama: "Nochunowa timo lokruoge moko. Timwa ok osebedo ka timo maber e season ma sani omiyo nochunowa wariemb Salim ma be chon ne tugonwa to osebedo ka timo dongruok nikech ok osebedo komiyowa kokonyo tim."

eng: Salim will now be replaced by Ouna, whose major responsibility is to ensure the team survives the axe.
luo: Ouna e ma koro biro kawo kar Salim to tich maduong' ma en go en neno ni timno ok ong'ul oko mar piem.

eng: “Ouna takes over with immediate effect. He is a great coach whom we believe will help the team get out of the relegation zone and stay in the top league next season,” added the CEO.
luo: CEO ma Mathareno nomedo wacho niya: "Ouna biro chako tich moriere. En koch molony kendo wan gi geno ni obiro reso timwa kik kir oko, kendo e season ma luwo timno obed nyime."

eng: Former Harambee Stars coach Bobby Williamson will also be part of the new-look bench as a technical advisor.
luo: Bobby Williamson ma chon ne tiego Harambee Stars be biro bedo e kind jong'ad rieko ne timno ma gi dho Ngere iluongo ni technical advisor.

eng: “I want to thank the leadership of Mathare United for giving me this opportunity to work at this great club," said Ouna.
luo: Ouna nowacho niya: "Adwa goyo ne jotend Mathare United erokamano kuom miya thuolo mar tiego tim maduong'ni."

eng: “My goal is to do everything within my powers and help keep Mathare in the top league. With all the knowledge and experience I have gained in my 12-year coaching career, I believe we can get positive results."
luo: "Tija maduong' en timo duto manyalo mondo akony Mathare odhi malo e piem ma dhi nyimeni.  Lony kod rieko ma aseyudo kaka koch kuom higni 12 an gadier ni wabiro chako yudo dwoko mabeyo."

eng: Despite enjoying a two-game in hand advantage, the former Gor Mahia assistant coach has a huge task ahead with safety only assured if they leapfrog either Western Stima or Vihiga United, who are five points ahead of them having played two games more in the 17-team league.
luo: Kata obedo ni pok gitugo tuke ariyo mondo giromre gi kwan tuke ma timbe mamoko osegoyo, koch ma chon ne en jalup koch ma Gor Mahia nigi gich maduong' nyime ka gima nyalo mana konyogi en loyo Western Stima kata Vihiga United  ka timbe ariyogo oloyogi gi points abich bang' moro ka moro kuom timbego tugo tuke 17.

eng: To start off their push for survival, Ouna will face fourth-placed KCB who are pushing to compete for the title today before tackling in-form AFC Leopards at the weekend.
luo: Mondo gichak safar mar tony, timb Ouna biro rakore gi KCB ma sani namba ang'wen ma be thuthni mondo points maggi omedre kawuono, kae to timb Ounano biro romo gi AFC Leopards e giko juma.

eng: “I cannot predict what I can or cannot do ahead of KCB match. We have had only one session and therefore the challenge to my players is to show me how much they can fight. We start as underdogs, but size counts for nothing,” said Ouna.
luo: Ouna nowacho kama: " Ok anyal singora ni en ang'o ma abiro timo to en ang'o ma ok anyal timo ka pok waromo gi KCB. Wasemana tugo tielo mokwongo omiyo tich maduong' ma jotuka onego onyenyna en ni to ginyalo thuthni matek ma rom nade. Inenowa kaka joma orony, to mano ok lichnwa."

eng: Prior to his sacking, the former Ulinzi Stars tactician had led the team in 14 matches where he managed one win, four draws, and nine losses.
luo: Ka pok noteng' lwete mogo, jatiekno ma chon ne tiego tim mar Ulinzi Stars notayo timno e tuke 14. E tukego duto nolocho mana dichiel, giromore gi timbe ang'wen, kendo nogogi e tuke ochiko.

eng: Out of the 14 matches played, the Slum Boys have only registered one win against Nzoia Sugar in a 1-0 win they bagged in February 8.
luo: E tuke 14 ma Slum Boys osetugo, ne giloyo Nzoia Sugar kende 1-0 chien kucha tarik 8 dwe mar Februar.

eng: They would have had two wins but their 2-0 victory over Zoo FC in January was scrapped following Fifa’s May 4 decision to relegate Zoo FC to Division One after finding them culpable of match fixing.
luo: Dine gilocho diriyo ka de loch ma ne giloyo Zoo FC (2-0) e Januar ne ok oruch kaluwore gi paro mar Fifa e Dwe mar Abich tarik 4 ma nogolo tim mar Zoo e FC e tuke mag Division One bang' yudgi gi ketho miluongo ni match fixing.
